Review.Titre: I ordered a battery for my Lenovo X250…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a battery for my Lenovo X250 from Battery Depot.  It worked for about 3 days.  Then completely dead.  Laptop would not work with it installed.  Removed battery and laptop works on power cord.  returned battery to Battery Depot.  Tracking shows they received it. 12 days passed, no refund.  Contacted credit card company, instant refund.  Waste of time, selling cheap chinese junk batteries.
Still waiting for delivery; BattDepot blame DPD but DPD do nothing.  Now chasing return of monies through the bank.  Seriously AVOID.

Seems like their deilvery guys are letting this business down; DPD have delivered my parcel to some random address (if at all) and claimed "It's delivered".Also, live chat does not work.  Totally unresponsive.

Well they do ship the Northern Ireland, so that's nice.However, premium shipping is not DPD/UPS as stated, it is Hermes. I am still awaiting delivery 3 days after dispatch. I paid for the premium service and received the standard shipping. I am not impressed.

Ordered laptop battery on Nov. 25,2023.  They said it was shipped on Nov 27,2023. I called DHL and the USPS and they never received it. They are not taking online orders at this time. Avoid at all costs. Their site has been hacked.

Review.Titre: I purchased a laptop battery with a 2 yr warranty.
Review.Contenu: I purchased a laptop battery with a 2 year warranty.After 18 months, it died completely. I received an RMA number and free shipping label.That was almost 4 months ago !!!I have bought many batteries in the past and referred clients, but what's the point if they don't stand behind their warranty or respond to inquiries.I am very disappointed...

No battery. Don’t even deserve one star. Order tracked all the way but what arrived is an empty envelope with a form saying thank you for buying from Battdepot UK online. Cheek!Failure isn’t acceptable.The envelope was not tampered with so Battdepot have a big problem at despatch - a 100% failure.

I am in the US and tried to order a power cord for my laptop. The US branch is located in Bellingham Washington. First they sent the wrong cord. Second they denied that they'd ever received the cord back. I proved that they had received it with the tracking. Lastly they promised me a refund that never showed up. This is a completely incompetent and unethical company.

Review.Titre: Forget customer service if something goes wrong
Review.Contenu: I wondered why people write lengthy reviews when they have a bad experience. I think I know why. It's just the extension of the frustration they had experienced. I  was sent a wrong laptop battery,  replacement sent with another defective battery. After 2 months of back and forth detailed emailing ( with pictures), chats and follow up, nothing has happened.  Now they are ghosting me. I thought being reasonable,  persistent and patient would see some results..but NO..! What a shame! If I  had worked the hours I  spent on seeking a resolution with this company, I could have bought a new laptop! Never again doing business with battery depot.

Ordered a replacement battery for my daughter's Asus laptop, this is the second replacement battery after the first lasted roughly 18 months. The second replacement wouldn't charge once installed in the laptop and was clearly defective.Was advised to fill out a form and return the battery for testing before they would refund or replace. Stupidly used royal mail (my fault) and the battery was seized and destroyed so over £75 out of pocket between the battery, postage and return postage plus the time emailing, filling out the form and returning the faulty battery.You live and learn, too much hassle for what should have been a simple transaction.

Review.Titre: Battery supplied did not match the one…
Review.Contenu: Battery supplied did not match the one ordered and not compatible with my Laptop. They did not have stock of the correct battery so it cost me postage both ways and I still had to find an alternative supplier.

Another poorly made product from another poorly made company.  The battery barely fit into place. And that only under more pressure than is safe for the computer.  In response they "consulted with their staff" (sure they they did) and recommended I fill out forms and wait for permission to return their battery for examination. Im sure a full bodied alibi would be sent at their earliest convenience."  Pass. Been there, done that. Aint happening again.As the poets say: "fool me once shame on you. Fool me twice shame on me."

Ordered a battery which turned out to be the incorrect one. PI06 v P106. Anyway, they don't have a pick-up service and their recommended courier won't accept the battery because it's regarded as a dangerous item. And Royal Mail won't transport it either. Makes me wonder how they managed to get it from GB to NI in the first place. I doubt that it was transported by sea.

Review.Titre: I bought wrong item for £42.98 and…
Review.Contenu: I bought wrong item for £42.98 and return it back then i received payment back £34.99 which it mien they have deducted £8 . Battdepot make profit in away or anther for me i payed £8 to posted back + £8 deducted by Battdeport it is not far trade make profit even if you buy something by mistake. Battdepot excuses for this deduction is not acceptable.

Review.Titre: I got sent a lower spec battery than…
Review.Contenu: I got sent a lower spec battery than the one I paid for. It took couple of exchanges to secure a RMA code required for me to return and they wanted to just give me a small refund to keep the battery which I didnt want.Finally secured code and packaged up securely purchase Evri return. They would not refund me the full return costs as I didnt pick the cheapest option which would have put at risk me returning within required window!One thing that shocked me after all this is finding out they use Evri which clearly states batteries should not be sent as prohibited items!A lot of hassle and time to secure return.

One of the worst experiences that I had. They shipped me a defective battery for the HP laptop, which worked only for couple of hours, so I had to open up the laptop again and put the original battery back. Fortunately, I didn't recycle the original battery. I paid about $50 for shippment (I had to pay shipment fee for return, even when they sent me a faulty part). The sad part is they didn't even apologize for the inconvenience. I'll never recommend them to any customer or family and friends.

Review.Titre: Will only respond once a public review…
Review.Contenu: Will only respond once a public review is posted. Poor customer service. I was sold the wrong battery, it did not fit. It was 2/3 the size of my original battery. I sent in photos that clearly showed the laptop and battery comparison and asked for an exchange. They told me it was the right battery and that they did not have an exchange to give. Expecting a refund of my original purchase, I paid the shipping BACK to their warehouse ($20) and was not given a full refund on my original purchase. They docked me another $20 off the battery so now I’m out $40 for nothing.

I was supplied with the wrong battery, it did not fit my computer even though the correct details were provided to the supplier. Following my complaint I was asked to return the part for a refund which cost me £5 for postage. The refund is being arranged however £8 is being deducted for which no reason has been given. I am therefore £13 out of pocket and will have to source the correct item elsewhere.

Review.Titre: The laptop battery  was dead when it…
Review.Contenu: The laptop battery  was dead when it arrived  it was dead, charged the Battery up and fitted to laptop seemed OK but not fully charged,  used the laptop for about half an hour, next time about two days after, went to use my laptop again and it was dead again.

Wrong item, didn't fit.- In practice individuals cannot ship rechargeable batteries- I had to open the bag to see if the battery was the right thing.So I can't return the battery, and if I did they would not accept it.

Review.Titre: Bought adapter and power lead said to…
Review.Contenu: Bought adapter and power lead said to be for a Dell Inspiron laptop. Item unusable as 'not recognised' by the laptop, as connector did not properly fit the laptop despite being described as 3 x 4.5.

Sent the wrong item!!! Now I have to rely on email only to get the matter resolved and I bet will not be very fast, I guess it's a Paypal claim re-time... I repair lots of laptops, this relationship is over before it has started... A phone number would be useful BattDepot.

Review.Titre: want a battery to last only 3 months
Review.Contenu: Great place if you want a battery to last about three months. And with 80% 5 star ratings you know what type of service you’re in for. Bought a battery in June lasted to September. Never was able to get the runtime out of the new battery. After I had a total failure of the battery I took the battery apart and surprisingly it was not the cells, but the chip inside the battery that had failed.  This stuff is just garbage. Read the warranty. they warranty everything except for the function of a battery.  They did respond to this review, which I was surprised with. And I did send back the battery. Getting emails response from them is brutal.  They never sent me new battery using the excuse they took the battery apart, but I told them that before I sent it in and they send me the return info so that was not an issue at that time. Best thing is to move on from this company and the companies that are subsidiaries.  Do a Google on these guys it is a disaster. Even BBB has a bad rating on these guys.
I purchased a new battery from this company and it operated normally for less than 5 days and then would not charge past 18%. Useless. Now lets see if the customer service is any better.
Sent a faulty product, refused to pay full return shipping for the item which is illegal under Irish and UK law*They have replied to this*It does not matter if its in their Terms, it is still illegal

Review.Titre: Not genuine as per pictures, and failed very quickly
Review.Contenu: Fundamentally, you are buying non original parts, though the pictures include details such as Dell logo which indicates it as being genuine.I ordered.  Started to smell a rat as the WH was 53, not 60WH as per original and other replacement batteries.  Messaged the seller, but it was already en route so accepted the overpriced non original battery as needed something that gave me plus 2 hrs on battery.Since then, have had issues.  Longitevity is great, but it cannot handle a resume and subsequently shuts down within a few seconds.  Windows reports an unexpected shutdown and you have to plug back into the PSU (even with sufficient power) to restart at which point its fine again until the next sleep cycle.Will be starting the RMA process as I am now beyond the Return timeframe.  Have ordered an original Dell battery for a few pounds more and the issue has goneFundamentally, I feel ripped off.  Let's see how the RMA process goes and will be end up stuck with a replacement battery I will not be using so will not be using this company again, nor will I recommend.  Maybe I am one of a few, but if you read into the reviews, you see the cracks appearing.

Ordered a battery for my HP Envy, got it in about 10 days. It didn’t fit so I asked for a replacement. I sent pictures of my laptop/battery + all information on the system. They told me it was the right battery (?) but that they could issue me a refund. When the refund was issued they did not reimburse for the shipping cost of the battery back (fine) but now not even a full refund of the original cost was given. I’m now out over $30 just to have no battery. It also takes a week or more to get a reply to emails. I ordered this battery on April 5 and am still dealing with them today (May 23) with no response.

purchased a laptop battery for my daughter and after 11 months it only works for 30 minutes - tried to get a warranty claim but they will not entertain me advising that this is normal wear and tear!!!!!!

Review.Titre: sent wrong charger was wrong voltage…

Avoid this company. Not to be trusted.Sent the wrong battery (I was very clear about the model #), refused to replace it and instead refunded only ~60% of the cost.

bought a battery on 7th August, did not last for even 50 days

Review.Contenu: 21 days in and still no delivery ! Poor service and a let down for a present at Xmas .

I bought two batteries for two T410s Lenovo Laptops.  Both batteries stopped holding a charge after about 9 months.  I requested a Warranty Replacement.  In the mean time, I ordered two new batteries.  When the two new batteries arrived, one was bad and would not hold a charge.  I filled out the RMA and paid the shipping charges to return the two warranty batteries.  It's been about 5 weeks now, and still no replacement batteries.  They have stopped responding to my emails requesting a status.  They first claimed they had not received the batteries.  However, the UPS Tracking number indicated they had.  After providing the tracking number which proved they received the batteries, nothing.  I will not do business with Battery Depot again.  Buyer beware.

Review.Titre: New battery pack would not charge
Review.Contenu: New battery pack would not charge, upon investigation one of the cells was no good. Could not be bothered to send it back. So the original laptop battery is still being used, with poor battery life.

Review.Titre: Ordered a battery from them for the…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a battery from them for the Chromebook 11-1101.Battery worked, but was 3/4mm thicker than the original provided in the Chromebook 11-1101.Ended up breaking the back plate of the Chromebook installing it.3/4mm extra thickness in electronics is a huge.They are clearly not checking manufacturing vs spec for the items they sell. AVOID, AVOID, AVOID.

Review.Titre: Poor product, poor service. Waste of money.
Review.Contenu: Product while indicated compatible with my device was not actually. Useless. The only reason this site even gets 1 star is because there was a pretense to processing my refund. It has been 2 months with absolutely no follow up or response. DO NOT waste your money with this company.

Review.Titre: I am still waiting for it to be…

I contacted support, and they told me to just break the tab and that two tabs aren't required, and one tab is more than enough. Instead of fixing the issue, they asked me to break the tabs. Review.Titre: Little Boy Lost. Mummy in desperation.
Review.Contenu: Battery ordered and paid on July 9th.Despite a personal telephonic phonecall on July 26th, my battery (tracked in Lyon, France??) has still not reached my home in Le Palais 56360 on July 31st. No wonder that day is a Sunday....

Review.Titre: AVOID THIS COMPANY AT ALL COSTS!!!!
Review.Contenu: AVOID THIS COMPANY AT ALL COSTS!!!!Complete rip off of a company.Falsely advertise items, then will not refund after I returned them !!!!!!Got 1 star simply because you can't give zero stars.UPDATE, I returned my full order to receive a partial refund, the mind boggles.I STAND BY MY PREVIOUS STATMENT!!!!A COMPLETE RIP OFF OF A COMPANY.!!!!

3-7 day delivery ?  update  21 days now  Battdepot could not care less its a courier problem they say no offer of alternative supply nothing.  Initially  mixed up the tracking and order numbers delivery is now indefinite no contacts available no idea when product will be received ,only coming from Melbourne Australia to Nowra approx 1100kms so what to do just should've purchased locally and spent the extra it would've been worth it  ,ive been deceived on time frame they would've know

I don't know how, but in spite of checking again and again, I ordered the wrong battery. When I noticed the mistake a minute later, it was already too late. Nothing could be done to prevent the erroneous product from being delivered, I was told. Being busy, I have no time to re-sell the product, so I have to give it away for free.

Now I have to waste even more time and get it sent back, hopefully to get a FULL refund. And have to start searching from another company to get another new battery. DO NOT BUY THEIR BATTERY, I had since read reviews about their batteries, its majority negative reviews.

Review.Titre: I sent back the bad battery with the…
Review.Contenu: I sent back the bad battery with the original invoice. According to the tracking, they have received it. I sent an email to this company, asking when I would receive my refund. I got no reply. It is under warranty, so I should be getting my money back. I refuse to order anything else from them, so an exchange is out of the question. It looks like I will be contacting my bank and disputing the charge.Update: finally got a response. I was told my refund would be processed early next week. We shall see.

Review.Titre: This is the second time I buy this…
Review.Contenu: This is the second time I buy this battery and I got the same issue, the first battery I just forgot to return then the second battery come with the same issue and battdepot said the battery is fine and they just refund the second battery and told to suck the first one, that means I am changing the provider, terrible customer experience, don't buy it.Sell as much as possible and don't worry about if customers are happy or not the only that matters is the profit, very nice mentality.People don't waste your time and money I'll find a provider who really cares about customers.

Ordered a replacement charging cable/ AC adaptor for my laptop. On receipt, I found that the 2 sections would not join together even using brute force. E mailed support dept. Asked to supply photos of the item from various angles. Later, was requested to get someone else to have a try. I said it was a serious manufacturing fault and no way they were joining up not by anyone. Support then claimed it may have been damaged in transit! Eventually they sent a new cable which immediately and without fuss connected to the a/c section. Just would not accept my explanation. Not acceptable.

Review.Titre: no refunds offered if you buy wrong item?
Review.Contenu: Ordered a Battery from BattDepot on a recommendation from Lenovo themselves, But bought the wrong battery for the model we had. Order was fast and delivered quickly but really disappointed you cannot return the item for a refund. Can only replace it. Well if they dont have the battery you need, then you cannot get a replacement. I therefore now have a battery I cannot use. Not good customer service in that respect !

Review.Titre: I sent my battery back last week for a…
Review.Contenu: I sent my battery back last week for a refund because they gave me the wrong battery. I have been emailing them for a week asking about why I haven't received my refund yet, and all they have to say is it's a high turnaround time. These people are terrible with getting refunds because the USPS told me that the package arrived at their facility. It's been almost a week and I still haven't received a refund.

Bought 2 batteries for MacBook late 2009. One replacement sent as first one tried was rubbish. Returned all 3 at my expense for a refund. These batteries were absolute rubbish, did not hold charge or even charge correctly. Used a free app for Mac coconutBattery to test them to ensure I was correct. Finally bought an excellent battery (2-power) from Duracell uk.

Review.Titre: How to review when goods not arrived
Review.Contenu: I am surprised to be asked to give my opinion on my order since I ordered a laptop charger on the 4th November, told it was collected by the courier that day but 12 days later the item has not arrived. When I asked for a refund I was told I had to wait up to 14 days for an investigation to complete. I have given one star because I couldn’t give none. David Sharples

Review.Titre: I ordered a charger for a DELL computer…

The replies seem to be generated by a computer and not a human. HERMES have given an order number but they keep telling me after six weeks I have to wait 7 - 14 days so that they can speak to HERMES.

Battery was faulty and had leaked in its box. They eventually agreed to accept a return but refused to pay the return postage. Definitely not worth buying from this company.EDIT: Was asked to return via cheapest return postage, but based on other reviews I chose a signed for postage as i didnt trust them. This still cost less than what battdepot charged for sending the faulty battery to me in the first place.  I also emailed battdepot before posting the battery to ask if they would refund return postage and was told that they didn't. By law they are required to pay for return postage for faulty goods.

Review.Titre: I ordered my Battery over a month ago

I was told to wait a maximum of 14 days to hear back. I waited over 14 days and had to contact them myself.It is the 7th December now and still nothing.

Review.Titre: Still no delivery and no refund

The reply is once again that I must wait until the courier (Hermes) has completed their investigation. The emails I receive from BattDepot come from The States so they obviously have difficulty communicating with and controlling Hermes. Disappointed. If they send you a faulty item and you have to return to them for testing they will refund monies for the item itself but not the postage you paid sending back their faulty item. Batteries are heavy so postage isn't cheap !! Poor show. Suggest you look elsewhere.

Review.Titre: Warranty not worth the screen it's written on

Even upon offering to pay the deposit, customer service stopped responding.I won't spend another dime with this company.  Might as well buy off Ebay, it's just as reliable.

They also lie and say they didn't receive any emails! They have no intention of rectifying their mistakes and I am out the money and my customer is upset that his laptop cannot be repaired! If you live in the US and us this company, they will not make it easy on you if you have a return. It is almost impossible to return to their address in British Columbia. There are customs issues and the need of a broker of some kind. It will end up costing you a lot of dollars and limited results. I spent $27 to ship a $50 battery and it is being returned to me. I am out a total of $87 and have a battery I can't use and I cannot call the company and talk to anyone to resolve the issue.Having discussed this with online "Live Chat" a postage paid label was sent. I am awaiting battery return to resend it. I will still be out about $37. I will say that the batteries seem to be good and do fit in the computers. They have charged up and are lasting hours between charges in our PC's. I will update again  when all is said and done.

Review.Titre: The 13-ac052na battery for my HP x360…
Review.Contenu: The 13-ac052na battery for my HP x360 Spectre arrived promptly but refuses to charge and PC battery manager won't recognise its presence at all. Putting the old battery back resolves the problem (apart from the old battery not holding charge well over time, which is why it needed replacing), which suggests the problem lies with the new battery, not the laptop hardware, software or charger.Disappointing. I've used generic batteries before without a problem. But this one is a dud.

I bought a battery. The shipping was fine and they sent me the right one. I installed it to my laptop and I noticed that the battery, I bought, drains so fast. I expected it to be better but my old battery(5years old) is way way better than I bought here. It was “Asus ROG GL503VD 15.2 Volt Li-Polymer Laptop Battery (4240mAh / 64WLAS314.” I wanted to bring my laptop in my everyday class but it should always plug in a charger otherwise it will die. I am very disappointed and I am hoping  to have another one or get my money back. Please!

I never leave negative reviews. I'm generally incredibly understanding with delays and issues, but this experience has been beyond frustrating. I ordered a battery and tried to cancel my order. Their customer service is nonexistent. I called them, as the website told me to, and got no response. I sent two livechats, which were supposedly answered after 1 business day, yet got no response on those either. At this point, the only way I'm going to get my money back is by disputing the charge at my bank. Do not use this service.

If i could give no stars i would. Ordered a replacement battery for my laptop. Hadn't heard back and when I checked the order status it was still sitting in pending. It wasn't until I contacted them that the online chat rep said the payment didn't go through and their accountant was the only one aware. Had I been contacted and said payment had timed out, I would have taken the appropriate action. However, they did not and when I asked for free expedited shipping they refused saying they could not do that. Terrible customer service.

Review.Titre: 2 poorly made chargers- tip snaps/bends at slightest movement
Review.Contenu: I got 2 chargers for my acer. They both broke quickly as the charging tip (part you stick into the laptop) bends(in one case) or (snaps off) in the the other. Very poorly made. I am now looking for another company that can sell compatible chargers that are better made

Ordered a replacement laptop battery on 18 of February, it was supposed to be delivered by the"circus" a.k.a. myhermes but never arrived, Battdepot were quick to snatch the money from my account even though there was no confirmation of delivery, it is now 11 of March (21 days) and Battdepot have yet to refund the amount paid. In the mean time I have ordered, received and fitted a replacement battery from another supplier. I will never use Battdepot again.Craig A Davies

Review.Titre: Order a battery from RiCHMOND BC…
Review.Contenu: Order a battery from RiCHMOND BC Canada. Review.Titre: THIEVES STEALING! BUSINESS IS A CON!

Absolutely THIEVES, AVOID HAVING YOUR MONEY STOLEN! DO NOT USE! Disgraceful.

92C37AFE78DAMy above order has been with a courier since 22nd Nov, they have made no attempt to contact me, I suggest you start using a new delivery partner. Least I should have been offered another battery to be dispatchex as I paid for this in good faith.

The delivery man lied. He said he’d attempted to deliver. He hadn’t. I was in the whole time. I then had to take time and the effort to go to a post office to collect. I paid £7.99 for delivery. What for?

Review.Titre: NON EXISTENT Customer service and quality of goods
Review.Contenu: Battery purchased less than 1 year old and randomly turns the machine off, contacted support via email and no reply in 2 months, still waiting... !! really poor service avoid. !They have since lied to me and said they have replied which is absolute crap.. I know how to check an inbox and junk folder.. total waste of time this company is.. DO NOT SPEND YOUR MONEY WITH THIS COMPANY.I would also add that any company who replies to customer complaints via Trustpilot is only trying to make themselves look better, replying to the customer directly would have saved all this hassle and bad review !!

The battery I bought for my MacBook Pro 15" (mid. 2010) was just as bad as the old one that needed to be replaced because it was 10 years old and discharged very quickly. Despite being calibrated, the new one also discharges quickly within a day. Will not send it back, but I cannot recommend a purchase.

Review.Titre: Do not buy batteries from this site
Review.Contenu: Do not buy batteries from this site. I got a defective battery for which I had pay return shipping. So two shipping charges, no battery, three weeks still no refund! I think I'm unlikely to see a refund at all. If I do get a refund it will be minus $30 for two shipping charges.

Review.Titre: The battery does not last long
Review.Contenu: The battery does not last long. At best it is an hour before it requires to be recharged. Even after I followed the initial instructions for charging.

Review.Titre: A certain ambiguity about which was the…
Review.Contenu: A certain ambiguity about which was the correct replacement for an HP laptop battery. Perhaps my order was incorrect.Perhaps it was not. Cost of returning the wrong battery was prohibitive. Sourced elsewhere. However, the company did reply to emails promptly.

Battery loses 30% power after fully charged after being turned off for 3-4 days, not like the OEM, If my PC wasn't new I would avoid, I mean, losing 30% charge when completely OFF in 3 days? (NOT in sleep mode)

Review.Titre: The item I particularly wanted was out…
Review.Contenu: The item I particularly wanted was out of stock, which seems to have became a permanent thing in the last few years, so I've had to do with a second rate option. Will have to try somewhere else net time.The item I wanted was 71 Wh with 2 year warranty. Both items with 2 year warranty seem to be permanently out of stock hence had to make do with the 1 year warranty item. Not my first choice, hence my disappointment. Sorry if this disappoints you, join the clan.

Review.Titre: Lenovo Laptop battery and mains charger.
Review.Contenu: 2 items arrived on time... okFirst item... battery fine... okSecond item... mains charger only lasted 5 days then died!Return policy too much hassle... packaging already in bin...shortly followed by charger.

Review.Titre: Good Luck Getting An Exchange or Refund
Review.Contenu: The good: I received my MacBook replacement battery from Battdepot within the expected time.  The bad: After determining the battery is not working in my MacBook, trying to get a RMA authorization has been a nightmare. I tried their online chat tool, which tells me they don't have enough agents available so... I also completed an emailed their RMA Request PDF form but their response is always, "Please complete the attached form and email it to..." . I have sent the completed form multiple times but the response is always the same. It's as if they are hoping I will give up on getting a replacement battery for the dead battery they sent me.
Battery arrived in good time.  However, disappointed that it is old stock, manufactured in May 2019.  It will inevitably have lost some of is power in that time.

Review.Titre: the service and delivery was excellent…
Review.Contenu: the service and delivery was excellent but the battery hardly holds any charge, It wasn't expensive so I guess you get what you pay for.
delivery and packaging were great and installation was easy, but the battery only lasts around 4-5 hours which is disappointing. I wish I had paid more for the original HP battery.

Review.Titre: Battery voltage and model is different…
Review.Contenu: Battery voltage and model is different from what ordered

Ordered a battery for my laptop, which I thought to be correct as the product stated name and laptop size for my device. Only to find that the battery was incompatible whilst installing. Messaged seller in order to place an exchange for correct battery. I was told that it was my fault I selected incorrect batter and that I must buy a new battery and return the current one. I decided to return the battery only to be told I must cover return shipping fee. On top of that I was not refunded initial delivery fee. I had to constantly message battdepot for my refund and this process took well over 2 weeks. Seems like this company is solely a dropshipper and does not care about customer service. I will be shopping elsewhere thank you.

Horrible service! They don't answer emails. They use UPS that should not be even existed.  They (both companies)work 9 to 5 plus weekends and holidays off. This is not how technology services should be provided. We depend on technology.  I ordered a battery for my work computer and was screwed up by their service! Finally the package came today ... and it was a wrong battery. An update. Battdepot answered today and sent me return label which is good.  So I will change 1 star to 2.

Review.Titre: Replacement battery doesn't work. Returns at your expense. Not happy.
Review.Contenu: Purchased a replacement battery for my Dell XPS 15.Received a faulty battery that won't hold charge. Now have to fill out a confusing returns form, and return the new dud battery at my own expense, so they can inspect it.Meanwhile I will be left without a working laptop, that I need for work. When you pay for a product and they don't deliver, the last thing you want to do is waste MORE time and MORE money trying to get them to rectify their mistake.Left as 2 stars while I wait to finish the returns process, could go up or down after.

Review.Titre: Recently bought a new laptop battery
Review.Contenu: Recently bought a new laptop battery, service was fine shame the new battery does not last much more than 20 minutes on a full charge. But to be fair could be the laptop, it is elderly.

We ordered the correct battery for an HP laptop. It wouldn’t sit correctly, so wasn’t exactly like original, so we wanted to return to seller. This was an ordeal, they asked for several photos, of the original battery etc. it cost me £4.45 to return signed for 2nd class. Eventually Battdepot refunded what I paid, but I was still £4.45 out of pocket for return postage.

Review.Titre: Based on my most recent experience…
Review.Contenu: Based on my most recent experience where I have not yet received the goods I purchased (12 days ago).  I have been told that they are making enquiries with the delivery agent (5 days ago).

Review.Titre: Decent seller just not sure about product.
Review.Contenu: The sellers delivered on time with good comms...But wouldn't recommend the product.Bought a replacement Battery for a mid 2012 15" MacBook pro.Easy enough to install.I followed all initial charging & uncharging instructions,but the battery takes 10+ hours to fully charge & only lasts about 4 to 5 hours doing light tasks.Doesn't seem like a good product.

The battery arrived quickly which was great. It fitted easily which was great. the problem is that when I use battery only for power the processor seems to run slowly. this problem goes away when i use mains power but it means portability is seriously compromised. I ordered the correct part number as I took it directly from my old battery, but the new battery seems to do something with the circuitry that slows things down. i am not happy.
Badly supplied, a lot of delays. Mostly because of DPDMISTAKES. Have also  informed  them.  Realise  that it  is  not  the  fault  of  your  company. Thanks  all  the  same.

I’ve had mixed levels of service from BattDepot. Generally the batteries are good and work well. However one battery I purchased in 2021 would not hold its charge within 6 months of purchasing. BattDepots response was that they could not help! I was forced to purchase a new battery from them recently which thankfully seems to be working well but 6 months is not acceptable for a so called new battery. Only time will tell how long this one lasts.

Delivery was fast, but the battery didn't fit properly and I ended up having to take it apart in order to remove it from the connector. The model of the battery and the laptop (an Early 2008 MacBook Pro) were correct, but the quality of the battery was poor

Service was good, quick delivery and questions answered. I am only able to give 2 stars however as the laptop battery, despite following initial conditioning instructions, drains rapidly. Should have paid the extra for an original part, lesson learned.

Review.Titre: Bought batteries from them 3 times for…
Review.Contenu: Bought batteries from them 3 times for the same device. Every single battery had issues with proper fit. I sent them videos showing the issue and 2/3 times I got a full refund where they sent me a  prepaid shipping label. Annoying experience for the first two times. And for the 3rd time I was told that I'd be getting a full refund because again the battery was at fault however after multiple failed attempts of reaching their customer service I was finally told that despite my video evidence there was nothing wrong with the battery. Tldr: battery quality is bad and customer service is inconsistent.

Review.Titre: Quality not as stated on website
Review.Contenu: I was not provided with a genuine HP replacement battery. The website quotes it to be an HP version battery for the laptop, however, upon replacing it against my old battery, my laptop refuses to calliberate it as it does not recognise it as genuine.

Very poor telephone enquiry service.  I had a question and left a message for them to get back to me.  They never did.  The recorded message was so garbled and indecipherable, I gave up all hope of ever hearing from them.  This is not the way to treat customers who pay your wages.  Sorry.Battdepot did respond to the above complaint but it does not make sense to have a telephone number when no one is there to answer it.  That’s just rude.

Not good enough!  Yes placing the order was simple enough and the delivery was on time but the battery was faulty and obviously not fit for purpose. I contacted customer service and returned the item as requested on 12th July then heard nothing until I contacted them again on 23rd July. I am still waiting for my refund.Any retailer is only as good as their response when things go wrong.  Sorry Battdepot, you have plenty of competitors out there so you need to up your game!

The return experience wasn't satisfactory. I admit it was my mistake that I didn't notice that I was ordering wrong battery (thinkpad T430 as opposed to T430s). I did get a refund but I had to pay two-way shipping and restocking fees. I returned it the same day I received it by the way. All in all I lost $45. The retail price was $48.

Review.Titre: 1st) due to BREXIT the parcel hasn't…
Review.Contenu: 1st) due to BREXIT the parcel hasn't arrived yet / still @ DPD for 7 days !!!2nd) I can't say anything about the quality of the product, yet.3rd) If this "waiting game" is the new norm... I will buy on the continent and no longer via CO.UK ! I rate the "overall experience" and so I can't leave BREXIT aside... sorry!

The battery came with instructions on charging and discharging a number of times but despite carrying these out the battery was only able to hit just over half of the original batteries capacity which is less than the battery i was replacing. I have given 2 because they gave a full refund and i bought a battery at a slightly higher price from another supplier  which reached and exceeded the original battery capacity.

Review.Titre: I ordered a new battery and this…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a new battery and this stopped holding charge after less than a year and have had to order another one which has now been fitted. The one taken out was bulging and the IT guy said that this should not have happened but when I emailed the company, was told that the battery not holding charge like this was normal

A battery and a couple of smaller items arrived quickly from the UK and well wrapped (but no battery warning label on the outer wrapper). One of the smaller items had been picked incorrectly (a USB adapter instead of a cable). BattDepot acknowledged their mistake immediately and offered to send the right part but only on condition that I returned the incorrect part at my cost and risk first, even after explaining to them my rights as a consumer. I wouldn't risk buying a high value item from them.

Review.Titre: I contacted the vendor as the wrapping…
Review.Contenu: I contacted the vendor as the wrapping was not sealed.My request via eMail to get advice how to deal with this was not answered.The battery works but there´s uncertainty if I received a used battery.LiIon batteries can be harmful if they had undergone severe shock.I am disappointed that the vendor did not contact me after my request, especially as I wanted to clarify this case before documenting it on Trustpilot.

Review.Titre: I placed an order for a laptop battery
Review.Contenu: I placed an order for a laptop battery. I was sent the wrong type,even though my request was specific! They told me that I have to pay for the return postage for the battery,which I did.I waited few weeks for acknowledgement of receipt & return of my money! Till date,there has been no form of correspondence from Battdepot!!This company is so disconnected  from its customers!!Will NOT recommend them to anyone!Very poor. Disappointing!

Review.Titre: Ordered a battery for a laptop
Review.Contenu: Ordered a battery for a laptop. It would only last 20 minutes and the computer wouldn't warn me when it was getting low; laptop would just turn off.It was ordered as a gift so was outside of the 30 day return period but they still wouldn't accept the return.Edit: Battdepot has since agreed to a refund on this purchase.

In using their website, making my purchase, and receiving it, the company was very professional. However, having installed my new laptop battery, it didn't work. On initial charging, it only partially charged (87%). Instructions said that this may happen and to 'remove and reinsert the battery and it should continue charging'. It didn't. After doing this several times, it has still not worked and I must rely on a mains power supply.

Review.Titre: I have ordered a laptop charger
Review.Contenu: I have ordered a laptop charger, all the images were showing a right angle plug, this being the reason for ordering from Battdepot, however, the charger which have arrived, has a straight plug, which puts a lot of strain on the laptop power port. Would have liked to get what was pictured....

All day long I had been waiting for the delivery, tracking it every hour. Always written that it was scheduled for delivery on the Tuesday. Nothing more until 7pm when I received message that it's been rescheduled for the Wednesday!It was already in the despatching center at 3am on the Tuesday nad the weren't unable to deliver it on that same day!

Review.Titre: Ordered a battery for my Toshiba laptop…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a battery for my Toshiba laptop online with the "local" collection option. Anywhere between 15 and 90 minutes it shuts down "hard" with no warning!This will be returned ASAP for, hopefully, a full refund Ross Gilmour,

Review.Titre: I've used their tools to find a replacement power supply.
Review.Contenu: I've used their tools to find a replacement power supply for my laptop, and have given the wrong part twice.  I've asked to RMA the two power supplies sent (they were never been used), and have been sent a reply.  I have sent the power supplies back and hope I get my money back. This has been a pretty terrible and time consuming exercise.

Review.Titre: When visiting the homepage of battdepot…
Review.Contenu: When visiting the homepage of battdepot I was rightfully under the impression to aquire an ORIGINAL dell xps 13 9365 battery and NOT only a dell xps compatible battery. The description indicated "Dell XPS 13 9365 7.6 Volt Li-Polymer Notebook Akku (5940mAh / 46Wh)" and (even more misleading the foto showed a battery with a DELL LOGO.What I received instead was a Dell compatible battery - a product that I could have bought for 20 Euros less elsewhere. The battery itself is alright (so far). But I'd rather not buy at battdepot again. Thx but no thx.

Review.Titre: Poor service and battery didn't charge
Review.Contenu: Battery wouldn't charge. No apology, offered to replace but sent via Hermes (worst courier company) and it never arrived. Again no apology, just copied and pasted instructions to return item, and wouldn't guarantee free postage to return - had to go through process with paypal which took up more time. All in all, bad experience, wouldn't recommend.

Review.Titre: Toshiba laptop battery delivered promptly but was a waste of money
Review.Contenu: Battery delivered promptly. Charged fully per instructions but unfortunately the battery lasts about 50 minutes (the original lasted >2.5 hours) in Win 10 "Best battery life" mode  and when I tested it further and opened 15 Chrome tabs it went from 46% to 1% in 2 minutes!I can't talk about all the batteries they carry but the one I got was a complete waste of money. The cost of the battery was 35$+tax (+shipping) but it does not even pay to return it as the cost to ship back is $25!

Review.Titre: Poor quality item plus terrible delivery
Review.Contenu: Replacement laptop battery,only holds charge for just over an hour. No better than one I am replacing. So not happy with purchase. Big problem with delivery company H, was advised on 5 occasions of delivery that day , but did not happen, seems it kept ending up back at depot. Eventually when delivery was made 8 days after parcel arrived in depot it was left on doorstep instead of my safe place.So would not buy from this company again

During this COVID crisis, they kept offering express delivery for €9,99 even though they knew they couldn’t deliver on time. 2 stars because of that disagrement. I would expect them to remove this option during this crisis. Especially when you know the regular delivery companies in France were delivering within their SLA.

Review.Titre: I found the battery I needed…
Review.Contenu: I originally rated battdepot 5 stars as it had the battery i needed and had a fast dispatch time. However, the battery lasted about 3 months before I ran into the same issues with the one I replaced (the battery couldn't hold a charge and turned off if unplugged).

For my first order, they sent me the wrong battery, even though the website said it would work for my HP. I had to send it back (and pay shipping) and they sent me another one. This one fit, but it only lasts an hour before having to recharge again. Will not buy these batteries again.

Review.Titre: I had to pay for their mistake
Review.Contenu: 2 faulty battery replacements for my Lenovo y50-70 laptop.I had to pay $17 to ship back the first faulty battery, however, they did pay for the second one, which is why I'm not rating 1 star.Overall, kind of confusing and disappointing. I guess I'll have to find another way to make my college laptop usable :/

Replacement Battery that was sent is not up to standard at the moment. The instructions that were provided were bland and non-informative. I also believe that the battery may be faulty, as it cuts out within 10 mins of use for about three runs, then after the third it runs perfectly for about an hour and a half.When emailing the support team, they recieve 5 stars for their response time; however again, the information provided was poor, but slightly more helpful than that of the note that was included in the package.

Review.Titre: Prompt delivery but quality of the…
Review.Contenu: Prompt delivery but quality of the product is way below expected. Battery lasts less than 2 hours despite following charging instructions provided. Was the least expensive of it's type that I could find so I guess you get what you pay for. Will spend the extra ££ next time.

Review.Titre: It's not so much Battdepot who have…
Review.Contenu: It's not so much Battdepot who have been very helpfull but their couriers this is  second attempt at getting a battery and still of it three weeks later. bottom line I still don't have a battery and automated responses.  I can't give more stars until the battery is deilvered

No response after 48 hours after leaving a voice mail and an email with customer support. After waiting 2 days, I finally got in contact with somebody via Live chat. After asking to be compensated for my delay via shipping expensive, this was refused. 48 hours is a long time to wait for an email/call back, I've had similar experiences with Amazon and they made right on their error via compensation/refund. I will not use BattDepot or recommend BattDepot at the moment. I give 2/5 and not 1/5 because the woman on the Live chat appeared to be kind and she was generally, helpful.

got the replacement battery from batt depot and I realised when I took it out there was a spot on the battery that seemed a little bit hollow and could be pressed down unlike the origional battery I was replacing that was solid through the whole of the battery body. The battery is easy to install and it is great that they also supplies the tools to help you replace it. unfortunately the battery replacement doesn't perform as I wished it to be. It only lasts 1hr 30mins after a full charge and doesn't always want to charge.

Review.Titre: The product I chose on website wasn't the original as advertised
Review.Contenu: The product I chose on website was titled as the original transformer that comes with my model of laptop. IT WAS NOT. There is a lot of small print the company will refer to when you complain to them about it. (REPLY BELOW IS PROOF OF THIS! ... after the purchase they give advise that they do not sell originals but the title of the product is misleading!) In other words ... if you're after a copy of an original model, this is the company for you. If you want original stuff, look elsewhere.On the other hand ... delivery was quicker than expected.

Review.Titre: This my second review, downgrade from 4 to 2 stars
Review.Contenu: This my second review. I previously gave 4 stars (because of poor customer service), but now I think this business deserves 2 stars. The reason is simple. The battery has low quality of use. After 6 months of use, the battery I ordered from battdepot has already reached its end of life. Upon reaching 20% of charge, my laptop shuts down. Also, it is hard to charge the battery to 100% since it stops around 90%. Despite being cheap at a quarter of standard price, the battery does not meet my expectations. My old battery had a life of 3.5 years, 7 times longer than this battery.

Review.Titre: My order was in error because bI did…
Review.Contenu: My order was in error because bI did not receive  email confirmation not my first order, so thought it hadn't gone through. I have received this with no address no contact no and no return label. Not at all satisfactory and I wouldn't order from them again.

Review.Titre: Fast delivery but poor quality battery
Review.Contenu: Fast delivery but poor quality battery. Charged it and discharged it three or four times as recommended but it lasts 50 mins instead of the expected four hours. To add insult to injury it then started to cause my laptop to blue screen at which point I removed it.

Unfortunately the battery I ordered would not retain any charge even after being plugged in for a whole day and would not go up a single percent. I would like to get a refund. Appreciate the quick shipping though.

Review.Titre: New battery for laptop is not a simple replacement
Review.Contenu: Battery arrived quickly.  Had issues with new battery- my laptop kept intermittently shutting down after installing it so contacted seller.  They replied within a few hours to give advice on what to try when installing. After following the installation instructions everything started working perfectly, however computer shut down again the next day in the middle of some work which I subsequently lost.  I would therefore be very cautious about replacing a battery again from anyone. I can no longer recommend this battery as it is unreliable and I have had to replace it with my old battery.
Fast Delivery, but battery was defect/:mit usable after 2 days... Difficult ti send the item back because of hidden supplier Addresse and invoice

I have an old-ish computer. I also am 'old-ish'. I am 75. I ordered a new battery from you because my elderly and infirm original battery was kaput. I needed to have  my computer on 'battery charge' 100% of the time. The battery which you sent me is also completely kaput. It also requires being in 'charge' 100% of the time. Yes, there was a modicum of 'charge' in it when it arrived, but that soon deleted. O.K. I understand I bought your battery at a very acceptable price - however, I would have thought - being naïve -  that your battery would have at least lasted longer than half an hour. I AM VERY, VERY, VERY DISAPPOINTED IN YOU. I FEEL i HAVE BEEN UTTERLY CONNED OUT OF ALMOST £20.

Review.Titre: The battery didn't fit so had too make…
Review.Contenu: The battery didn't fit so had too make the holes bigger and loosen the screws later because the mouse pad wouldn't work if they was tight. The battery keeps my laptop powered up for 2 hours instead of 8 when I bought it new.

Review.Titre: Order was delivered quickly however the…
Review.Contenu: Order was delivered quickly however the battery was slightly thicker than the original and caused issues with the operation of the mouse pad on the laptop.Unfortunatly we had to return and source an original HP part elsewhere.

Review.Titre: Your delivery of the Package…and subsequent acknowledgement of receipt of package that was sent back.
Review.Contenu: Your delivery of the Package (Replacement Laptop Battery) I ordered a number of weeks ago was excellent. The package arrived within 4 days from the date of order. Unfortunately, the battery I ordered was the incorrect type.  Upon instruction from your sales department, I sent back the incorrect battery, carefully an securely packaged to the address recommended. This package was sent via registered post. That was almost 2 weeks ago now. I am still awaiting confirmation that the battery was received and tested by yourselves. Once I receive acknowledgement of this and confirmation of a refund, I will proceed to ordering the correct type battery as directed.Regards, Mary Horgan

Listen, 2 stars as it did not solve my problem..., it could well be that my laptop has had 'the best of times'.... What I would recommend however is an extension of communication if the problem is not solved, because that would help the issue that I have, and other people might have.... (and 'me' is a not yet senile 57 year old, originating from mainland Europe, who is not allowed to go out because of his medical condition, trying to solve issues on line....). Ordered replacement battery for 11 year old Dell XPS 15 laptop. Speed of battery delivery was good (2 days) and packaging satisfactory (no apparent damage). Installation - no problem.Carried out 4 full charge/full discharge cycles as per instructions. Used the in-built Dell battery meter for measuring charge level.During these preliminary cycles, typical ‘battery-only’ operation of the laptop was used to carry out the discharge procedure. On each occasion It was noted that the battery charge level decreased steadily to around 60% after 1 hour. At this point, the computer shutdown without warning. On restarting using external power, the battery charge was seen to be practically zero. This ‘cliff-edge’ performance drop-off characteristic has been displayed repeatedly now since purchase with no signs of improvement.However, it must be said that the battery appears to hold its fully charged condition for several days if the laptop is left shutdown, disconnected from external power and unused.

However, my issue is that I discovered a defect in both batteries which I pointed out to them in great detail in several emails but they STUBBORNLY REFUSED to respond or acknowledge my comments. I was staggered by this and very irritated. How could they be so ill-mannered and dismissive of me when I was making a very valid point several times over??? They just prolonged and complicated the issue. For that reason only I regret to say that I cannot recommend them.

Review.Titre: I bought a replacement battery for my…
Review.Contenu: I bought a replacement battery for my laptop (November 2018) and only 8 months later am receiving a message to say 'consider replacing your battery'.  After 1 hour 50 minutes of use, the battery drops to 50% and then almost immediately reaches critical point.  On contacting Battdepot, I was told that if a battery lasts more than two hours after 8 months use, it is not deemed faulty however (as I have attempted on several occasions to convey)  the battery is not lasting even two hours and therefore, I believe, is at fault especially when taking the aforementioned message into account.Battdepot have been totally intransigent when discussing this issue with me and have referred me to their T&C's rather than concede that the battery is not fit for purpose.  Perhaps they should add in a section to their small print that says 'as soon as a battery leaves our warehouse and we have received your money, you are on your own even if you have very good grounds for concern, we won't assist you.  Please note that our batteries are of poor quality so best of luck'.  I would avoid using this seller.

Review.Titre: Battery arrived with fault. Poorly soldered connector.
Review.Contenu: Ordering process and delivery was first class but when I plugged in the battery, nothing. On closer examination I found one of the leads from the connector plug had not been soldered properley, onto the circuit board. The repair was tricky due to the small size of the lead but I have done this type of thing before, being a Radio Ham. The soldering went well and the battery eventually charged and now seems O.K. I asked BattDepot for a partial refund as I had saved them return postage and the cost of repair of the battery but they declined. I need another battery for another laptop, but I will be buying elsewhere.

Review.Titre: My item saw more of Europe than I have in the last year
Review.Contenu: My item had a suggested delivery period 3-6 working days. I was notified that I would receive it the Wednesday before Easter and stayed in to receive it.  I followed it's journey on the tracker and it travelled from the UK to several places in the UK then to Germany and France before returning to the originating location in the UK.  Easter intervened and I finally got the item delivered to Dublin, Ireland a week later than it had originally been notified for delivery. It arrived within the 3-6 working days stated on the website but as I had been notified of a delivery date and stayed in to receive it I was disappointed that due to Easter and the non working days associated it took an extra week for the delivery.   Had I not been advised of the original delivery date and only the one on which it actually arrived I would have given a better rating.  Poor communication and sending the parcel east instead of West contributed to this.

Battdepot had both the smaller and the larger capacity, easily identifiable, at the right price. The replacement arrived in a couple of days and was fitted soon after that. Problem solved.p.s. I've just received her shopping list for the weekend via email and I've no doubt I'll be called on to help print off pictures of her great grandson when I drop the shopping off.
